IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Presentation of theatre performances and other live events for the general public
IRS990.MissionDesc: Boxcar Theatre is dedicated to supporting bold concepts and unique visions of emerging and established directors. Utilizing dynamic imagery physical movement and storytelling Boxcar strives to establish an environment in which audiences are engaged in a visceral sense and an intellectual capacity.
IRS990.Desc: Presented theatrical performances and live events

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: 2016: Non-charitable contribution to support venue development
2019: SBA grant of $8,000; legal settlement of $2,500

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: Boxcar Theatre made a program-related investment of $137,483 in Mr. Tipsy's US Investors LLC a theatrical production company materially controlled by Nick A Olivero

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Nick Olivero artistic director of Boxcar Theatre and Peter Liu president of Boxcar Theatre are both members of Sam Lee Laundry LLC a theatrical production company that partnered with Boxcar Theatre to present "The Speakeasy" from September 2016 to August 2019.
Form 990 is distributed via email to all board members prior to filing

All compensation decisions regarding the Executive Director are approved by a majority of the full Board after reviewing comparability data and engaging in discussion. The Executive Director abstains from the approval process.
All governing documents are available to the public upon request. In addition tax filings are also available on the Guidestar website.
